mapper.select: SELECT UB.POST_NO, UB.TITLE, UB.VIEW_CNT, UI.EMAIL, DATE_FORMAT(UB.REG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS REG_DT FROM USER_INFO UI, USER_BOARD UB WHERE UI.USER_NO = UB.USER_NO ORDER BY REG_DT DESC
